solution_line_template: Three times as many misses as hits is {num_times_misses_as_hits}*{value_50_from_question} = {calculated_misses}
The total number of hits and misses in the game is {calculated_misses}+{value_50_from_question} = <<{calculated_misses}+{value_50_from_question}={total_hits_and_misses}>>{total_hits_and_misses}
